DevOps Engineer
===============

Company: CloudScale Technologies
Location: Remote (US)
Experience: 4-6 years

About Us
--------
CloudScale Technologies is a fast-growing SaaS platform serving enterprise customers.
We're building the next generation of workflow automation tools and need talented
engineers to scale our infrastructure.

Job Summary
-----------
We're looking for a DevOps Engineer to help us scale our infrastructure and improve
our deployment processes. You'll work closely with development teams to build and
maintain CI/CD pipelines, manage cloud infrastructure, and implement automation.

Key Responsibilities
--------------------
* Design and maintain CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions or similar tools
* Manage AWS infrastructure including EKS, RDS, and Lambda
* Implement infrastructure as code using Terraform
* Monitor system performance and implement improvements
* Collaborate with development teams on deployment strategies
* Participate in on-call rotation for production issues
* Document infrastructure and runbooks

Required Qualifications
-----------------------
* 4+ years experience in DevOps or SRE role
* Strong experience with AWS services (EC2, EKS, RDS, S3, Lambda)
* Proficiency with container orchestration (Kubernetes, Docker)
* Experience with infrastructure as code (Terraform preferred)
* CI/CD pipeline development (GitHub Actions, Jenkins, CircleCI)
* Scripting skills in Python or Bash
* Experience with monitoring tools (Datadog, Prometheus, Grafana)

Nice to Have
------------
* Experience with GitOps workflows (ArgoCD, Flux)
* Knowledge of security best practices and compliance (SOC 2)
* Experience with database administration (PostgreSQL, Redis)
* Contributions to open source projects

Benefits
--------
* Competitive salary and equity
* Remote-first culture
* Flexible PTO
* Health, dental, and vision insurance
* 401(k) matching
* Professional development budget
